meanings.definition: (物事が)最新の状態にされた、更新された
meanings.english_definition: (of something) brought up to date; updated.
examples: El software está actualizado. (The software is updated.)
La información en este sitio web está actualizada. (The information on this website is up to date.)

meanings.definition: (人が)最新の情報を持っている、事情に通じている
meanings.english_definition: (of a person) having the latest information; well-informed.
examples: Necesito estar actualizado sobre las últimas noticias. (I need to be updated on the latest news.)
Él siempre está actualizado sobre los temas de tecnología. (He is always up to date on technology topics.)

usage_notes: 'Actualizado' is the past participle of the verb 'actualizar' (to update) used as an adjective. It can refer to things that have been updated or to people who are well-informed.
